byline.original: By MICHAEL R. GORDON and DAVID E. SANGER

abstract: Many details of nuclear accord with Iran have yet to be determined, leading critics to seize on omissions in bid to shape deal to their liking; criticisms have placed Obama administration on the defensive.
lead_paragraph: Some of the unexplained elements of the preliminary accord have already been seized upon by critics, from Israel to Saudi Arabia to the halls of Congress.

headline.main: With Details of Iran Deal Still in Flux, White House Opens Sales Effort
headline.print_headline: With Details of Iran Deal Still in Flux, White House Opens Sales Effort

snippet: Some of the unexplained elements of the preliminary accord have already been seized upon by critics, from Israel to Saudi Arabia to the halls of Congress.
